response.overview: This video answers the following questions:  Did Humans Really Evolve from Apelike Creatures? (Menton) Does the Big Bang Fit with the Bible? (Lisle) What’s Wrong with Progressive Creation? (Mortenson) Is the Intelligent Design Movement Christian? (Purdom) Can Creationists Be “Real” Scientists? (Lisle) What’s the Best “Proof” of Creation? (Ham) Doesn’t the Order of Fossils in the Rock Record Favor Long Ages? (Snelling) Why Is the Scopes Trial Significant? (Menton) Was the Dispersion at Babel a Real Event? (Hodge) When Does Life Begin? (Mitchell) Does Radiometric Dating Prove the Earth Is Old? (Snelling) How To Respond to Someone Who Asks, “Why Is This Important?” (Ham) Concise and fast-paced, this cutting-edge video is especially great for teens and young adults. (Ten of the answers are based on topics in The New Answers Book 2, and two are totally new.)
response.title: The New Answers DVD Disk 2
